title: Produce a Player Interview Segment
description: A broadcast needs to produce a pre-recorded interview with a star player to air during a pre-game show.

tasks.description: Schedule the interview with the player and a reporter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds a suitable time and books the interview.

tasks.description: After the interview is filmed, ingest the raw footage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent loads the footage into the editing system.

tasks.description: Edit the interview down to a 3-minute segment, adding graphics and background music.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces the final, ready-to-air video segment.
